ogham/dog

DNS client with DNS-over-TLS and DNS-over-HTTPS support

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Command-line tool for DNS-over-HTTPS, works on routers and UNIX systems
  • command-line DNS client in Go, like dig but friendlier
  • Dynamic DNS client with a web UI and many providers
  • Proxy and server for DNS over HTTPS
  • Proxy for DNS-over-HTTPS and Oblivious DoH
  • DNS forwarder with DoT and DoH support
  • DNS over HTTPS and TLS profiles for iOS and macOS
  • DNS server with weather, time, unit conversion, and other utilities via dig
  • Proxy for encrypted DNS protocols
